mapper.select: SELECT /* MybatisCrudDao.allScientists */ A.*, J.cd_nmm AS fos_nm FROM scientist A LEFT OUTER JOIN code J ON A.fos_cd = J.cd AND J.cd_grp = 'FOS' ORDER BY A.birth_year DESC

SELECT /* MybatisCrudDao.findScientistById */ A.* , (SELECT S.cd_nm from code S WHERE S.cd_grp = 'FOS' AND A.fos_cd = S.cd) AS fos_nm , A.create_id , A.create_time , (SELECT mgr_name FROM manager WHERE id = A.create_id) AS create_name , A.modify_id , A.modify_time , (SELECT mgr_name FROM manager WHERE id = A.modify_id) AS modify_name FROM scientist A WHERE A.id = #{id}
SELECT /* MybatisCrudDao.findScientists */ A.* , (SELECT S.cd_nm from code S WHERE S.cd_grp = 'FOS' AND A.fos_cd = S.cd) AS fos_nm FROM scientist A ORDER BY A.birth_year DESC

SELECT /* MybatisCrudDao.searchScientists */ A.* , (SELECT S.cd_nm from code S WHERE S.cd_grp = 'FOS' AND A.fos_cd = S.cd) AS fos_nm , A.create_id , A.create_time , (SELECT mgr_name FROM manager WHERE id = A.create_id) AS create_name , A.modify_id , A.modify_time , (SELECT mgr_name FROM manager WHERE id = A.modify_id) AS modify_name FROM scientist A
AND UPPER(A.name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{name}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.fos_cd) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{fosCd}) || '%'
ORDER BY A.birth_year DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT /* MybatisCrudDao.addScientist */ INTO scientist ( name, birth_year, death_year, fos_cd, create_time, modify_time, create_id, modify_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{birthYear}, #{deathYear}, #{fosCd}, now(), now(), #{createId}, #{modifyId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* MybatisCrudDao.modifyScientistById */ scientist SET name = #{name}, birth_year = #{birthYear}, death_year = #{deathYear}, fos_cd = #{fosCd}, modify_time = now(), modify_id = #{modifyId} WHERE id = #{id}
